preconditions.precondition: A Security Profile has been created and disabled

mainSequence.step: Security Engineer enables the Security Profile
Create security profile with name: secProfileESP and file: ./templates/secprofile.yml
Notify EventBus about security profile creation
Disable security profile with name: secProfileESP
Notify EventBus about security profile disable
Enable security profile with name: secProfileESP
Notify EventBus about security profile enable
All attached identities in the system re-evaluate policies
